review: 동네에서 가까운 박물관 후문족에 위치해서 정문에서는 한참 걸려요. 외대와 가까운 후문으로 가면 빠르게 접근할 수 있답니다. 6층으로 이루어진 박물관은 종류에 따라 층이 나누어져 있어서 관람하기 좋습니다. 1층은 광물 & 암석, 2층은 포유류 & 기타동물, 3층은 조류, 4층은 곤충, 5층은 수산동물, 6층은 식물로 되어 있어요. 사람들도 많지 않아서 둘러보기 좋고, 자연에 관심많은 아이들은 정말 좋아할 것 같습니다.
review_en: It's located in the rear gate of the museum near the neighborhood, so it takes a long time from the main gate. If you go to the back gate close to the University of Foreign Studies, you can access it quickly. The six-story museum is good to see because it is divided into different floors. Minerals & Rock on the first floor, Mammals & Other Animals on the second floor, birds on the third floor, insects on the fourth floor, aquatic animals on the fifth floor, and plants on the sixth floor. It's good to look around because there aren't many people, and I think children who are interested in nature will really like it.
